languages.description: Erinnere dich an Weisheit durch Erneuerung.
languages.name: Lotus Amaga

languages.description: Rappelez-vous la sagesse par le renouveau.
languages.name: Lotus Amaga

languages.description: Ricorda la saggezza tramite il rinnovamento.
languages.name: Lotus Amaga

languages.description: Recuerda la sabiduría a través de la renovación.
languages.name: Lotus Amaga

languages.description: 通过更新铭记其中的智慧。
languages.name: 天女 Lotus

languages.description: 更生より得られる知恵。
languages.name: Lotus Amaga

languages.description: Lembre-se que a sabedoria vem através da renovação.
languages.name: Lótus: Skin Âmaga

languages.description: ระลึกถึงสติปัญญาได้อีกครั้งผ่านการฟื้นฟู
languages.name: Lotus Amaga
